name: Gunducky Industries (itch)
description:
An attempt at a starfox ish game developed in 2017. Initially it was released on PS4 and Steam. I removed it from sale because it was badly reviewed and sold terribly and I felt like I should stop charging money for it. I found out later that there was at least 1 person who really liked it so I'm putting it up free (with ads) here.

Music by Dale North.

Voice acting by Mel Shiner
